title: # 519 - Rachel Wolfson (Jackass) & ME
itunes:title: # 519 - Rachel Wolfson (Jackass) & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Jackass member and comedian, Rachel Wolfson. We talk about how Johnny Knoxville discovered her, male nudity, scorpion botox, shooting jackass forever, weed, getting sent to a boarding school, and much more!  

 

Follow Rachel 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rachelwolfson 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/wolfiecomedy
